The Lord of the Rings Online: Mordor
The Lord of the Rings Symphony

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|July}}
Events that occurred on 31 July
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1917]]''' – [[Thomas Kenneth Barnsley|"Tea Cake" Barnsley]] is killed near [[wikipedia:Ypres|Ypres]] while consoling a captured prisoner.
* '''[[1924]]''' - Actor [[Garard Green]] is born.
* '''[[1944]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 77]].
* '''[[1947]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 109]].
* '''[[1960]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 223]].
* '''[[1965]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[letter 274a]].
* '''[[1969]]''' - J.R.R. Tolkien writes [[Letter 311]], concerned with his health.
* '''[[1982]]''' - The third episode of the new version of the [[The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series)|1981 radio series]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is aired on [[BBC|BBC Radio 4]].
* '''[[1988]]''' - [[Mythcon 19]] in [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[1989]]''' - [[Mythcon 20]] at [[wikipedia:University of British Columbia|University of British Columbia]], [[wikipedia:Vancouver|Vancouver]].
* '''[[1993]]''' - [[Roland Adlerberth]] dies.
* '''[[1993]]''' - [[Mythcon 24]] at [[wikipedia:University of Minnesota|University of Minnesota]], [[wikipedia:Minneapolis|Minneapolis]].
* '''[[1999]]''' - [[Mythcon 30]] in [[wikipedia:Milwaukee|Milwaukee]], [[wikipedia:Wisconsin|Wisconsin]].
* '''[[2001]]''' - Author [[Poul Anderson]] dies.
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[The Lord of the Rings Symphony]] at Heinz Hall in [[wikipedia:Pittsburgh|Pittsburgh]], [[wikipedia:Pennsylvania|Pennsylvania]].
* '''[[2004]]''' - [[Mythcon 35]] at [[wikipedia:University of Michigan|University of Michigan]] in [[wikipedia:Ann Arbor, Michigan|Ann Arbor]].
* '''[[2011]]''' - ''[[Picturing Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2015]]''' - [[Mythcon 46]] in Hotel Elegante, [[wikipedia:Colorado Springs, Colorado|Colorado Springs]].
* '''[[2017]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mordor]]'' expansion is released.

==In Arda==
:''Note: Months of the [[Shire Calendar]] only have 30 days, so no events have nor will happen on the 31st.''<noinclude>[[Category:Dates|213]][[fi:31. heinäkuuta]]</noinclude>
